sentence.Network_en: I had never seen bombing on such a scale, and I was healthily apprehensive.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从未见过如此大规模的轰炸，所以我的恐惧是理所当然的。

sentence.Network_en: What I really want is to live healthily for as long as possible.
sentence.Network_cn: 我真正想要的是健康长寿。

sentence.Network_en: We must re - educate people ( to eat more healthily ).
sentence.Network_cn: 我们应该对人们进行再教育 ( 使之重视饮食卫生 ).

entry.def: Someone who is healthy is well and is not suffering from any illness.

example.ex: Most of us need to lead more balanced lives to be healthy and happy...
example.tran: 我们中大多数人需要过更为平衡的生活，以保持健康和快乐。

example.ex: She had a normal pregnancy and delivered a healthy child.
example.tran: 她正常妊娠，生了个健康的孩子。

entry.tran: 显示健康的;反映健康的
entry.def: If a feature or quality that you have is healthy, it makes you look well or shows that you are well.

entry.tran: 有益于健康的;促进健康的
entry.def: Something that is healthy is good for your health.

example.tran: 对健康大有裨益的室外活动

entry.tran: （机构或体系）兴旺的，运作良好的
entry.def: A healthy organization or system is successful.

example.tran: 经济繁荣的社会主义国家

entry.def: A healthy amount of something is a large amount that shows success.

example.ex: He predicts a continuation of healthy profits in the current financial year.
example.tran: 他预计本财年能继续保持可观的利润。

entry.def: If you have a healthy attitude about something, you show good sense.

example.ex: She has a refreshingly healthy attitude to work...
example.tran: 她对工作持一种明智态度，令人耳目一新。

example.ex: It's very healthy to be afraid when there's something to be afraid of.
example.tran: 不逞匹夫之勇是很明智的。

auth_sentence.content: I was eating normally and healthily and doing the right exercise.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was eating normally and healthily and doing the right exercise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was eating normally and healthily and doing the right exercise.

auth_sentence.content: But there are ways to do things a little bit more healthily.
auth_sentence.res_content: But there are ways to do things a little bit more healthily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But there are ways to do things a little bit more healthily.

auth_sentence.content: So no , not a raving right winger, just healthily sceptical.
auth_sentence.res_content: So no , not a raving right winger, just healthily sceptical.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So no , not a raving right winger, just healthily sceptical.

Sentence.sentence: They keep America's economy running healthily.
